body.name: Refreshing 24h Day Cream by Jean&Len with Aloe Vera & Cucumber, provides intensive moisture & protects the skin for premature ageing, vegan face moisturizer, 1.69 Fl. Oz.

Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 52 mins
features: 24H FACE CREAM: Thirst quencher for the face? Our facial moisturizer with aloe vera, cucumber extract, hyaluronic acid and valuable plant oils provides your skin with intensive moisture. For supple, radiantly beautiful skin 24 hours a day.
HIGH QUALITY INGREDIENTS: The concentrated active ingredient complex with hyaluronic acid provides intensive moisture and pure plant oils reduce dryness lines & feelings of tension.
HOW TO USE: Apply to cleansed skin and massage in gently. Avoid the eye area.

WITHOUT GEDØNS*: For us, Gedøns* are things and especially ingredients, that our founder Len wants to avoid in our products. These include parabens, silicones and animal ingredients. We do not claim that these ingredients are harmful or bad. We simply don't want certain substances in our products because we know many of you don't want them either.

ABOUT JEAN & LEN: Jean&Len was founded in 2013 by Leonard Diepenbrock. The idea - very good-smelling care with predominantly nourishing formulas, that looks cool and doesn't gather dust in the eco-corner. Made in Germany.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Refreshing 24h Face Cream Aloe Vera/Cucumber, 50 ml/ 1.69 fl oz Thirst quencher for the face? Our face cream with aloe vera, cucumber extract, hyaluron and valuable plant oils provides your skin with intensive moisture. If you apply cream regularly, dryness lines and tightness are history. For supple, radiantly beautiful skin 24 hours a day. How to use: Apply to cleansed skin and massage in gently. Avoid the eye area.

Without Gedøns* Gedøns for us are ingredients that founder Len personally likes to avoid. These include parabens, silicones and animal ingredients. Certain substances we simply do not want to have in our products, because we know that many of you do not want that either. Refreshing Refreshes with aloe vera, cucumber extract & thermal water Hyaluronic Acid The concentrated active ingredient complex with hyaluronic acid provides intensive moisture

Jean&Len in every home Jean&Len was founded in 2013 by Leonard Diepenbrock. The idea: very good-smelling care with predominantly nourishing formulas, that looks cool and doesn't gather dust in the eco-corner. Today, our cosmetic products are available in over 5,000 stores of dm, Rossmann, Müller, BUDNI, Tegut and at other retailers. The entire cosmetics range and even more beautiful things without Gedøns* are available in our online store and in the Cologne flagship store. We started with shampoo for children without silicones, parabens and animal ingredients. Inspired by our motto "What touches you, becomes a part of you", the range has been expanded. In doing so, we have not stopped at a wide variety of care products, but are always trying out new things. From handbags made from a vegan leather alternative, to notebooks made from innovative stone paper for which no tree had to die, to spirits such as gin and whiskey from a German manufactory - there are many things that can be made of less "Gedøns*".

reviews.reviewText: Ich finde den Duft nach Gurke angenehm, da dieser eher subtil ist. Mei Gesicht spannt jetzt nicht mehr, da ich in Klimatisierten Räume arbeite. Finde die Zutaten echt super, da die Poren jetzt nicht mehr so zukleben und das Gesicht sich viel besser anfühlt. Auch diese finden meine Kolleginnen super.

reviews.reviewTitle: Jean & Len Feuchtigkeitsspendende 24h Gesichtscreme Aloe Vera und Gurke
reviews.reviewText: finde ich sehr gut , zieht sehr gut ein und die Haut bleibt weich und glatt.Also ich finde sie sehr toll :-)
+das Produkt gefällt mir seid langem und deshalb bestelle ich immer wieder !
Finde die Creme gut, allerdings nicht fürs Gesicht!
